component.name: Scopebuddy GUI
component.summary: Allows you to configure Gamescope through a GUI for Scopebuddy

description.p: GUI for scopebuddy, a tool which makes editing launch options far less of a hassle. This GUI guides users to properly use gamescope/scopebuddy, assists the user in writing to ~/.config/scopebuddy/scb.conf, and serves no other purposes at this time. It was made with Python and Qt Designer.
